introduction:
Icemark is an AI Agent for Product Managers that provides specialized capabilities like market research, PRD writing, and prototype design, as well as general advanced assistance capabilities. To continue, Icemark requires an API key.
Note: Icemark is built on Roo Code 3.5.5.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
chooseProvider: Choose an API provider to get started:
providerTip: Before starting, you must configure the LLM provider. We recommend using DeepSeek or OpenRouter. You can find more information in the following materials.

telemetry.title: Help Improve Icemark
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent.
telemetry.changeSettings: You can always change this at the bottom of the <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>
